text: Savognin was a municipality of the district of Albula in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Savognin, Bivio, Cunter, Marmorera, Mulegns, Riom-Parsonz, Salouf, Sur and Tinizong-Rona merged into the new municipality of Surses. ==Other websites== * Official website of Savognin Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden Category:Ski areas and resorts in Switzerland
title: Savognin
